article.summary: The bloodletting will hit hardest in back-office operations, risk management, and compliance.

all_candidates.title: OpenAI bets big on audio as Silicon Valley declares war on screens
all_candidates.summary: The form factors may differ, but the thesis is the same: audio is the interface of the future. Every space -- your home, your car, even your face -- is becoming an interface.

all_candidates.title: ‘College dropout’ has become the most coveted startup founder credential
all_candidates.summary: AI founders are increasingly using their "dropout" status as a credential during YC pitches.

all_candidates.title: 「導入後の評価軸がない」生成AI導入決裁者が答えた、手探りで進める生成AI活用の実態
all_candidates.summary: Ragateは情報システム部とDX推進室の意思決定関与者505人を対象とした調査結果を公表した。生成AI導入に関する懸念点や今後の予算動向を解析し、意思決定者が取るべき対応を述べた。
